name: Spirit Blade: The Winds of Destiny
name_original: Spirit Blade: The Winds of Destiny
description:
Spirit Blade is a parody of bad translations, set in a unique fantasy world.

When an eight year old boy discovers that he is the chosen wielder of the Spirit Blade, he must somehow fulfill his destiny of bringing free will to humanity.

Spirit Blade, although difficult to understand due to it's intentionally incomprehensible dialogue, asks the question, "Does free will exist, or are we all on a set course in our lives?"

If Zero Wing's "All your base are belong to us" is funny to you, then you'll find Spirit Blade to be a riot.

The story continues with Spirit Blade II: The Dichotomy of Eternal Victory
